alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 12:50AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goliad, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Coleto Creek Park, Ander and Oak Village. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 632 and 648. US Highway 59 between mile markers 650 and 672. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
